entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
